const response = await client.search({
  query: {
    match: {
      city: "madrid",
    },
  },
  aggs: {
    tags: {
      significant_terms: {
        field: "tag",
        background_filter: {
          term: {
            text: "spain",
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
